full_summary:
# Welding Services Request for Proposal
### Title: Pressure Vessel Modifications, Welding and Brazing Services

#### Government Tender Announcement Details

* Reference Number: cb-7635-45338294
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: NRCan-5000074393
* Publication Date: July 27, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: August 29, 2023 (14:00:00)
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

#### Tender Description

Natural Resources Canada is seeking bids from qualified contractors to provide welding and brazing services for the modification of an existing pressure vessel. The vessel will be used for pressurized chemical looping technology, a carbon capture solution for small and medium industries. The work includes:

1. Modifying the existing pressure vessel to house the reactor system
2. Performing the modifications as per the designed drawings and specifications
3. Conducting a pressure test on the modified vessel
4. Upgrading the TSSA registration for the vessel

#### Important Details

* The required modifications have been designed, drawn, and stamped by a licensed professional engineer in Ontario.
* The proposed project area is Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.
* A single contractor is sought to perform the modifications.

#### Request for Proposal

Bidders are invited to submit a proposal outlining their approach, prices, and experience in relation to this project. The selected contractor will be awarded a contract to perform the modifications.

#### Required Documents

Three documents are provided for download:

* Tender Notice (English and French)
* Drawings for TSSA-registered pressure vessel (English)
* Drawings for TSSA-registered pressure vessel (French)

#### Contact Information

* Jason Mulligan, Contracting Officer
* Email: Jason.Mulligan@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 553-8975

---
